pullrequest.title: Fix sonar and wireless sensor visualization - > 3.1

content.raw:
These tests move us from 0% to 40% coverage of SonarVisual and TransmitterVisual, nice work:

* [SonarVisual coverage](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/83/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_rendering/SonarVisual_cc.html)
* [TransmitterVisual coverage](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/83/clover-report/_var_lib_jenkins_workspace_gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64_gazebo_gazebo_rendering/TransmitterVisual_cc.html)
content.html:
These tests move us from 0% to 40% coverage of SonarVisual and TransmitterVisual, nice work:

  • SonarVisual coverage
  • TransmitterVisual coverage
